__e: Beckett and I have not been exactly hitting it off lately.
Okay, I know how that looks, but something is going on with Beckett, and I-I-I'm worried about her.
But whatever happens between Beckett and me, I want you to know... I mean, we could break up tomorrow, we could spend the rest of our lives together... but she will never take your place in my heart.
Beckett, this doesn't make any sense.
Trust me, Detective Beckett, you do not want to go there.
Oh, dad, Beckett, this is David.
